sentences.english: The concentration of myricetin on MWNT/G was determined by cyclic voltammetry.

sentences.english: Furthermore, the cyclic Voltammetry curve of gingerol indicated that the reaction was half reversible process.

sentences.english: The voltammetric and adsorptive behavior ofthe system is studied by means of linear sweep and cyclic voltammetry.

sentences.english: The application of cyclic voltammetry in the preparation of electrochemical sensors was studied.

sentences.english: The anodic stripping voltammetric characteristics of Cu (?) on PVA modified electrode is studied.

sentences.english: Linear sweep voltammetry (LSV) was chosen to detect the amount of the deposited silver.
sentences.chinese: 本傳感器的響應信號用線性掃描伏安法進行檢測。

sentences.english: A voltammeter is a device for measuring voltage or amperage .

sentences.english: At last, the effects of RH on voltage-current characteristics and discharge stability are investigated.

sentences.english: Platinum particles were electrochemically deposited on glassy carbon electrodes (GCE) modified with carbon nanotubes.

sentences.english: A method for determination of trace mercury in urine by anodic stripping 2nd order differential voltammetry with a gold disk electrode is reported.
